discover.title: Ikot Ekpene Plaza
discover.address: Ikot Ekpene Plaza, Akwa Ibom State, Nigeria
discover.description: A bustling market hub and social center known for its unique raffia products.

discover.title: Green Park
discover.address: Green Park, Ikot Ekpene, Akwa Ibom
discover.description: A serene park with lush greenery, perfect for family picnics and leisure walks.

discover.title: Raffia City Mall
discover.description: Modern shopping center offering local and international brands.

discover.title: Unity Library
discover.description: A public library with access to books, research materials, and Wi-Fi.

discover.title: Museum of Art
discover.description: Preserving local history and heritage through exhibitions and artifacts.

discover.title: Town Hall
discover.description: A venue for community events, business meetings, and social programs.

discover.title: Fitness Trail
discover.description: Outdoor gym and jogging trail to promote health and wellness.

discover.title: Raffia Monument
discover.description: Iconic sculpture representing the town's raffia weaving heritage.
